honocar.title: Hono-Car!
honocar.description: Honoka-chan avoids cars while listening to "Susume â†’ tomorrow " as a background music.

maruten.title: Maru-Ten!
maruten.description: Hanamaru-chan makes Yoshiko-chan fallen-angel. You swipe the screen and hit a black feather to Yoshiko-chan!

yamidori.title: Yami-Dori!
yamidori.description: Prevent to make Kotori-chan's THE HOT POT! You tap Kotori-chan on the screen and take away her cakes.

oimo-no-mikiri.title: Oimo no mikiri
oimo-no-mikiri.description: Enemies aim for Hanamaru-chan's oimo (potate). You tap quickly after a sign and defend her oimo!

rinadoko.title: Rina-chan box "Where?"
rinadoko.description: Find out Rina-chan hiding in a cardboard box.

review-lovelive-cyber-security.title: Review! LoveLive Cyber Security!
review-lovelive-cyber-security.description: Study about Cyber Security again with Yoshiko-chan, Hanamaru-chan and Ruby-chan.

marusuki.title: How much do you like manmaru?
marusuki.description: Get on the rhythm and tap manmaru (perfect circle) takoyaki! Chisato-chan dislikes green peppers, even if they're finely cut.
